test.name: Open Task Page And Check Title

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Run Keyword Unless
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments if ``condition`` is false.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword Unless
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments if ``condition`` is false.

kw.name: Fail
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.
